nodes.long_description: Contractors Showdown delivers an immersive military-styled VR First-Person Shooter experience. Engage in heart-pounding combat as you, along with 59 other players, navigate a vast and detailed 16 square-kilometer map. The game centers around a thrilling Battle Royale game mode, where strategic prowess and combat skills are paramount.  Gear up for intense battles, dynamic team play, and a visually stunning VR environment that thrusts players into the forefront of military actions.
nodes.short_description: Contractors Showdown delivers an immersive military-styled VR First-Person Shooter experience that centers around a thrilling Battle Royale game mode, where strategic prowess and combat skills are paramount.

nodes.change_log:
Version 1.3.1.0
Bug Fixes
Task description errors
Incorrect pricing configuration for advanced bullets
Incorrect pricing configuration for associated items
Item duplication
Items purchased in the store but not claimed disappear after entering and exiting a match
When switching hideout floors while closing eyes during match loading, all player equipment disappears upon entering the game
Rapidly placing items in the backpack causes items to be placed outside the backpack
If the safe container is taken out and not stored back, the safe container will disappear
Air wall blocking entry after opening the airdrop door
In Resort lighthouse, picking up items causes the player to fall through the ground
Incorrect description for the suture kit on scavs
Double doors in Dam locked room
Map and Environment Fixes
Hospital locked room cannot be entered by jumping and climbing from outside
The westernmost city area cannot allow access to the 3rd floor
Entering the hospital emergency department main entrance, the second-floor left restroom stall can trap players
The bank tunnel connecting to the vault has a spot that traps players
The hotel second-floor staircase can trap players if walking close to the wall
Across the road from the Golden Resort Hotel, there’s a small newspaper stand that traps players when approaching, with no exit
Window shards are overly bright
Complex collision on merged flowerbeds can trap feet
Missing collision on the circular sign in the bank lobby
Added collision to the bank restroom toilet

Patch Notes: v.1.3.0.1
Fixed armor attached to backpacks disappearing when changing scenes.
Fixed HQ upgrades not consuming required items.
Fixed items not being retrievable from the safe during a match.
Fixed gas pipe pliers not being sellable, which caused game crashes.
Fixed Resort 208 key description incorrectly showing as 202 key.
Fixed issue where task items could not be submitted.
Fixed safe items not being retrievable after reconnecting from a disconnect.
Fixed various text errors.

Game Update Notes
Maps
. Resort: A new map designed with a focus on urban combat.
. Metro: Now requires an entrance card, obtainable through raids or purchasable
from traders.
. Air Drops: Added to the maps Suburb, Dam, and Resort.
New Feature: Safe Container
. Functionality: Items stored in the safe container, including the container itself, will not
drop upon death.
. Equipping: Can be equipped at HQ via the relevant terminal on the lower back.
. Obtaining: The initial safe container can be acquired by completing merchant tasks.
HQ Function Adjustments
. Storage Space Redesign:
o Weapon Wall: Now supports mounting armor, helmets, and backpacks, but
cannot hold accessories.
o Shelves: Helmets, backpacks, and armor can no longer be placed on regular
shelves.
o Key Board: A new key board has been added.
. Dedicated Storage Boxes: Added new storage options:
o Medical storage box
o Accessory storage box
. HQ Map Redesign:
o New upgradeable perks have been introduced.
o Some facility upgrades have been transferred or merged.
. Store Purchasing Experience Optimization:
o Associated Purchases: New feature for related item purchases.
o Direct Shipping: Added for streamlined delivery.
o Magazine Purchases: When buying magazines, you can now simultaneously
purchase bullets.
. Inbox Redesign:
o Mail System: Pre-quest items and rewards will now be sent via mail to the
inbox.
o Temporary Storage: A new temporary storage area has been added to the inbox.
. Career Stat Page: A new career stat page has been introduced.
. Ammo Loader: Now includes an unloading function.
Weapon-Related Updates
. New Parameter:
o Accuracy (MOA): Measured in Minute of Angle (MOA). Weapons will exhibit
random bullet spread at long distances based on their accuracy rating.
. New Interactions:
o HK Slap: For weapons like MP5, Evo3, G3, PSG, etc., when the charging handle is
locked back, quickly hitting it with your hand releases the handle.
o AR Bolt Release Slap: For AR-type weapons, when the bolt is locked, quickly
hitting the bolt catch with your hand releases the bolt.
o Manual Bolt Lock: When pulling back the bolt, hold the B/Y key while releasing
the charging handle to manually lock the bolt.
. Accessory Installation: Optimized the prompt effect for accessory installation positions
during assembly.
. New Firearms:
o G3 7.62x51 Assault Rifle A3
o G3 7.62x51 Assault Rifle HK91
o G3 7.62x51 Assault Rifle AK4
o G3 7.62x51 Assault Rifle SPUHR
o G3 7.62x51 Assault Rifle PRS
o G3 7.62x51 Assault Rifle HK51
o G3 7.62x51 Assault Rifle HK51-K
o G3 7.62x51 Assault Rifle HK51 ACE
o PSG-1 7.62x51 Designated Marksman Rifle
. New Accessories:
o Falcon Scope 1.5-6X (for G3 series)
o G3 Scope Rail BT3
o G3 Scope Rail High Lever
o G3 Scope Rail FAB
o G3 Series 7.62x51 Mag (10-round)
o G3 Series 7.62x51 Mag (20-round)
o G3 Series 7.62x51 Mag (30-round)
o G3 Series 7.62x51 X-Drum (50-round, black)
o G3 Series 7.62x51 X-Drum (50-round, olive)
o PSG-1 Scope Rail
o Taco Scope 6-42X (for PSG-1)
. Removed Weapon:
o G3 7.62x51 Assault Rifle SG1
. Armor Optimization: Improved the feel of attaching various pouches to armor.
New Characters and Bosses
. Initial Female Characters: 2 new female characters added.
. New Bosses: 3 new bosses introduced
Mission Updates
. Mission Adjustments:
o Total mission count increased from 96 to 150 with updated arrangements.
. New Mission Types:
o Photo Missions: Use a special device to photograph specific targets.
o Placement Missions: Locate a delivery spot in the scene and place specific
mission items.
o Specific Equipment Kills: Eliminate targets using specific equipment or clothing
combinations.
Medical Items and Statuses
. New Status:
o Deep Wound: Causes continuous loss of health and hydration while active. Can
be permanently removed with advanced bandages or a suture device.
. Medical Item Adjustments:
o Suture Device: Now heals "bleeding" and "deep wound" statuses.
Repairing a limb with it reduces the limb’s maximum health (effect
clears upon returning to HQ).
Durability displayed as battery levels.
o Painkillers: Now deduct hydration when used; pill count reflects durability.
o Healing Syringes: Durability shown as a progress bar on the syringe.
o Mica Scanning: Scanning medical items with Mica reveals more effect details.
o Special Effect Syringes: Quality has been adjusted.
. Specific Medical Items:
o New Bandages:
Gauze (old bandage): Heals bleeding.
Bandage: Heals bleeding and deep wounds, but is bulky.
Advanced Bandage: Heals bleeding and deep wounds efficiently.
o New Suture Devices:
Level 1: 2 uses, 8-second use time, reduces current health max by 50%.
Level 2: 3 uses, 7-second use time, reduces current health max by 25%.
Level 3: 6 uses, 6-second use time, reduces current health max by 10%.
o New Painkillers:
Level 1: 3 uses, 120-second duration, -0.2 hydration/second for 90
seconds (total 18 points).
Level 2: 6 uses, 120-second duration, -0.2 hydration/second for 60
seconds (total 12 points).
Level 3: 6 uses, 180-second duration, -0.1 hydration/second for 60
seconds (total 6 points).
Item Distribution Adjustments
. New Items:
o 30 new miscellaneous items.
o 10 new valuable items.
. Spawn Optimization: Improved the item spawn experience.
. AI Drops: AI now drops backpacks and items.
